textBeforeTable: Part-time MBA colleges in Mumbai and the programs offered: Here are some of the colleges you might want to consider for your MBA. "It's a myth that a part time MBA is not considered as good as a full time MBA. If you have a substantial work experience to support your part-time MBA, you have as good chances to make it big in your career as any other regular MBA programme. And with Mumbai being the hub of a number of industries, a part time MBA in Mumbai promises to be a great choice", says Ankita Arora, Expert Counsellor at Learnhub. //]]> GA_googleFillSlot('article_interstitial_0'); // fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs); js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/en_US/all.js#appId=177001602375020&xfbml=1";
